thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Frontier Communications Says ‍Attempts To Reach A Fair Agreement With Cox Have Failed

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Frontier Communications Says ‍Attempts To Reach A Fair Agreement With Cox Have Failed
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Frontier Communications Corp:
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - “‍DISAPPOINTED THAT COX CONTINUES TO DENY OUR CUSTOMERS ACCESS TO KIRO-TV”
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍RESOLVING THE DISPUTE WITH COX AND RETURNING KIRO TO CO‘S LINEUP IS “A PRIORITY FOR FRONTIER”​
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍ATTEMPTS TO REACH A FAIR AGREEMENT WITH COX HAVE FAILED
* FRONTIER COMMUNICATIONS CORP - ‍COX‘S “ACTIONS AMOUNT TO A REFUSAL TO PARTICIPATE IN MEANINGFUL DISCUSSIONS​” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
